duties_responsibilities.duty: Ensure safety, quality, customer experience, and productivity in the transportation department.
Collaborate with site leadership on quality and customer experience metrics.
Streamline logistics through standard work implementation and team leadership.
Support and commit to all safety programs and OSHA compliance.
Identify and lead process improvement initiatives and Lean tools implementation.
Supervise and train Transportation Associates to ensure timely delivery of customer orders.
Lead change and innovation at a fast pace to drive process improvement.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree or 2+ years of Amazon (blue badge/FTE) experience.
